examples: Pyrenaria menglaensis G.D. Tao in Acta Bot. Yunnanica, 5(2): 183 (1983).
source: IK; Index Herbariorum ed.8. In Acta Bot. Yunnanica, 5(4): 379 (1983) and l.c.  5(2): 183 (1983) the first name is spelled 'Gou' but in Index Herb. Sin. (1993)  and Bibliogr. Chinese Syst. Bot. (1993) the name is spelled 'Guo'.
